Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

@SianieRoo @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @MPGeorgeEustice @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Yes I agree. The process toward this is well underway here and is for the council’s professional officers to pursue free from political interference they might harm their case. As for the EA, I will along with @AaronBell4NUL be ensuring they are held to account for their failures

Knowing that children and babies are choking on Landfill Gasses and that their parents weep and that toddlers are hugging air purifiers enrages and tortures me. @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @carolecadwalla @DJAndyMoor @StinkStopthe

Save our Souls ! The landfill gases are filling my home. We’ve had one night off in 5& even then I’m not convinced I wasn’t nose blind to it as I had a sore throat in the morning. 
The @envagency are watching while they slowly kill us @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink

Seriously think it’s at the point that @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice should evacuate people living within a 3mile radius.Too many health effects,concerns raised by local docs&no health risk assessment undertaken @Cap_it_off @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/v5QQpLrIbr

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @DJAndyMoor @HelenVi00175623 @djlange @StinkStopthe Please share these pictures of children suffering locally. Residents need air purifiers to sleep. @EnvAgency are negligent and allowing it to happen. Please share and sign the petition to make sure this does not happen in the UK ever again #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/PQebyt4QnB

Removing this kind of habitat during bird nesting season is appalling practice, and trying to placate us all with the ruse that ecologists will wade through thick brambles to find and protect active nests is insulting. They won’t. @kiergroup @EnvAgency https://t.co/ekGmPRyEmW

This isn't just a stink, hydrogen sulphide is a lethal gas that can kill instantly at high enough concentrations. If this keeps on happening, night after night, someone is going to die. Someone needs to help Newcastle under Lyme.

urls.title: Aghlisk River: Thousands of fish killed in pollution incident
urls.description: An investigation is taking place after the "extensive pollution" of a river in County Tyrone.

tweets.text: Horrific news breaking of a massive fish kill on the Aughlish River, Northern Ireland. Thousands of fish killed in agricultural pollution incident ⁦@daera_ni⁩ - time to step up and act decisively. Immediate details needed https://t.co/PNyVh6r0QD

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts
